mapper.insert: insert into table_employee(number, name, gender, age, dep_id) values (#{number}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{number}, #{dep.id})
mapper.update: update table_employee set number=#{number},name=#{name},gender=#{gender}, age=#{age},dep_id=#{dep.id} where id=#{id}
#ä¿®æ”¹ update table_employee set dep_id=null where dep_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select e.*, d.number as depNumber, d.name as depName from table_employee as e left join table_department as d on e.dep_id = d.id where e.id = #{id}
